Package hotelproject.controllers.db

Class HotelData

java.lang.Object
hotelproject.controllers.db.HotelData
public class HotelData
extends java.lang.Object
This class is used to manipulate all data from the hotel database.

  • Constructor Details

    • HotelData

      public HotelData()
      This constructor is used for initializing all encapsulated data.

    • HotelData

      public HotelData​(DatabaseManager dbm, java.util.ArrayList<Room> rooms, java.util.ArrayList<RoomType> roomTypes, java.util.ArrayList<Booking> bookings, java.util.ArrayList<User> users, java.util.ArrayList<Customer> customers)
      This constructor is used for initializing all encapsulated data.
      Parameters:
      dbm - build connection with database.
      rooms - all room objects
      roomTypes - all room type objects
      bookings - all booking objects
      users - all user objects
      customers - all customer objects

    • getBookings

      public java.util.ArrayList<Booking> getBookings()

    • getCustomers

      public java.util.ArrayList<User> getUsers()

    • addRoom

      public void addRoom​(Room room)
      Add a new room. First add the room object in the list then update the room in the database.
      Parameters:
      room - the room object

    • deleteRoom

      public void deleteRoom​(Room room)
      Delete a room. First delete the room object in the list then delete the room in the database.
      Parameters:
      room - the room object

    • updateRoom

      public void updateRoom​(Room room, int oldRNum)
      Update a room information. First find the focal room's index in the list, then call RoomsDB's update method to update the room object.
      Parameters:
      room - the encapsulated new room object.
      oldRNum - the old room number for identify the room.

    • availableRooms

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> availableRooms​(java.sql.Date checkIn, java.sql.Date checkOut)
      Find all available rooms during the time period.
      Parameters:
      checkIn - the check-in date
      checkOut - the check-out date
      Returns:
      all available rooms saved in ArrayList.

    • viewDetails

      public java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> viewDetails​(Room room)
      View a room's detail.
      Parameters:
      room - the room object for viewing
      Returns:
      the room's information saved in Hashtable.

    • addRoomType

      public void addRoomType​(RoomType newRoomType)
      Add a new room type. First add in ArrayList then update the database.
      Parameters:
      newRoomType - new room type object

    • addCustomer

      public void addCustomer​(Customer customer)
      Add a new customer. First add in ArrayList then update the database.
      Parameters:
      customer - new customer object.

    • updateCustomer

      public void updateCustomer​(Customer customer, int oldCSSNum)
      Update a customer's information according to its social security number. First update ArrayList for customers. Then update the database.
      Parameters:
      customer - the new customer object
      oldCSSNum - the customer's social security number

    • deleteCustomer

      public void deleteCustomer​(Customer customer)

      public void addUser​(User user)
      Add a new user.
      Parameters:
      user - user object for adding

    • updateUserInformation

      public void updateUserInformation​(User user, java.lang.String oldUName) throws java.sql.SQLException
      Update a user's information.
      Parameters:
      user - the new user object
      oldUName - the user's name
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - this method need to handle SQLException when call

    • getBookingAutoID

      public int getBookingAutoID()
      Get booking's id.
      Returns:
      booking id is an integer number

    • addBooking

      public void addBooking​(Booking newBooking)
      Add a new booking in the system. First add the new booking to the ArrayList. Then update the database.
      Parameters:
      newBooking - new booking object
